definition: less advanced/underdeveloped/lagging behind/the younger generation/the less experienced ones
back/behind/rear/afterwards/after/later/post-
to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound
to come late and leave first/last in, first out (LIFO)

sentences.english: Respect the elders, love juniors , save all with mercy, care for others.
sentences.chinese: 敬老尊賢，愛護後進，慈悲渡衆，關懷他人。

sentences.english: Workers will go on a "last in, first out" basis.
sentences.chinese: 對工人的裁員原則是羚“後進先出”。

sentences.english: It has great significance of edification for the development and construction of boundary and drop-behind districts.
sentences.chinese: 對邊窮後進地區的開發與建設很有啓迪借鑑意義。

sentences.english: This thesis deals with a study on the interest of low- achievers in English learning.
sentences.chinese: 本文是關於後進生英語學習興趣的一次調查研究。

sentences.english: It is to let junior unripe score a success.
sentences.chinese: 二是讓後進生獲得成功。

sentences.english: That is, after school, but also to the backward students extra lessons.
sentences.chinese: 那就是放學之後還要給後進生補課。

sentences.english: Therefore educators should show humanity care for the backward students.
sentences.chinese: 爲此，教育者應注重對後進生的人性關懷。

sentences.english: The education and transformation of backward students is one important content of class management work.
sentences.chinese: 後進生的教育與轉化是班級管理工作的重要內容。

sentences.english: Teach students how to learn English but teach students English.
sentences.chinese: 英語教學中對後進生應“魚”“漁”並授。

sentences.english: The article presents some methods and suggestions on how to change backward students.
sentences.chinese: 對如何教育轉化後進生提出了方法和建議。

sentences.english: On some certain conditions laggers can be changed to good students.
sentences.chinese: 在一定的條件下，後進生可以向先進轉化。

sentences.english: Furthermore, he poured the last of his lifeblood into educating and promoting the younger generations so that they would inherit his ideals.
sentences.chinese: 更把最後的心血，普施於教育後進上，來傳承其理想。

sentences.english: The rear-fed launcher is used to launch non-lethal anti-riot grenades.
sentences.chinese: 後進彈的發射裝置用來發射無致命的防暴榴彈。

sentences.english: The school has set up a special class to help slow students.
sentences.chinese: 學校成立了一個特殊的班級，幫助那些後進生。

sentences.english: We should also help those lagging behind.
sentences.chinese: 我們還應當幫助後進的同志。
